Uses of Class
com.vmware.vcenter.vm.hardware.ConnectionState

  • Packages that use ConnectionState 
    Package Description
    com.vmware.vcenter.vm.hardware
    The com.vmware.vcenter.vm.hardware package provides interfaces for managing the virtual hardware configuration and state of a virtual machine.

    • Uses of ConnectionState in com.vmware.vcenter.vm.hardware

      Fields in com.vmware.vcenter.vm.hardware declared as ConnectionState 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ConnectionState ConnectionState.CONNECTED
      The device is connected and working correctly.
      static ConnectionState ConnectionState.NOT_CONNECTED
      The device is not connected.
      static ConnectionState ConnectionState.RECOVERABLE_ERROR
      Device connection failed due to a recoverable error; for example, the virtual device backing is currently in use by another virtual machine.
      static ConnectionState ConnectionState.UNKNOWN
      The device status is unknown.
      static ConnectionState ConnectionState.UNRECOVERABLE_ERROR
      Device connection failed due to an unrecoverable error; for example, the virtual device backing does not exist.
